quote: I have been doodling since childhood. I have a passion for illustrating but cannot paint or colour for that matter. I illustrate what I am trying to communicate through my writing. My images are like drawings in a science text book.
I have a hard time writing, and I usually have to put a timer at my desk and put it on for an hour. But I love to illustrate, and I can hardly stop myself.
How long a book tends to illustrate depends on the book. 'The Awful Aunty' took me 10 days.
The fact that I have been successful merely means that I can write and illustrate in my own way.
